title: Fireside with the Underboss - The Murder of Willie Boy Johnson
description: Wilfred "Willie Boy" Johnson was a notorious decorated Gambino hitman, Willie Boy and Sammy build a strong relationship -- until his hatred for John Gotti gets him killed.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Wilfred "Willie Boy" Johnson was a notorious decorated Gambino hitman, Willie Boy and Sammy build a strong relationship -- until his hatred for John Gotti gets him killed.
itunes:summary: Wilfred "Willie Boy" Johnson was a notorious decorated Gambino hitman, Willie Boy and Sammy build a strong relationship -- until his hatred for John Gotti gets him killed.
